qas.question: How many consecutive years was American Idol the top rated show?
How many consecutive years did either the performance or results show rank number one?

context: Seasonal rankings (based on average total viewers per episode) of American Idol. It holds the distinction of having the longest winning streak in the Nielsen annual television ratings; it became the highest-rated of all television programs in the United States overall for an unprecedented <a0_0>seven<a0_0/> consecutive years, or <a1_0>eight<a1_0/> consecutive (and total) years when either its performance or result show was ranked number one overall.
